hymn.title: Deep and wide
hymn.chords: | C - - - | F - Dm - | Em - Am - | Dm/F - G7 - | C - C7/E - | F - D7/F# - | C/G - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Deep and wide, deep and wide, There's a foun -- tain flow -- ing deep and wide. Deep and wide, deep and wide, There's a foun -- tain flow -- ing deep and wide.

lyrics.stanza: Deep and wide, deep and wide, There's a fountain flowing deep and wide. Deep and wide, deep and wide, There's a fountain flowing deep and wide.
